### Proto-oncogenes subject to copy number amplifications
<br>
Proto-oncogenes completely covered (i.e. transcript overlapping 100%) by genomic segments subject to amplifications:

```{r cna_oncogenes_amplified, echo=F}
myOptions <- list(paging = F, searching=T,caching=F)
if(nrow(cna_data$oncogene_amplified) >= 10){
  myOptions <- list(paging = T,pageLength=10, searching=T,caching=F)
}
DT::datatable(cna_data$oncogene_amplified, options = myOptions, escape=F, extensions = "Responsive")
```
